general.title: Biden, in prime time, to bid farewell to nation as Trump prepares to take office
general.description: President Biden will deliver his last Oval Office address as he prepares to hand over power to President-elect Donald Trump and exit politics after a decadeslong career.
general.snippet:

similar.title: Critics Choice Awards 2025 Postponed Again Amid Los Angeles Fires
